Title: Relates to the priority of persons with responsibility to determine the disposition of human remains
Summary: Relates to the priority of persons with responsibility to determine the disposition of human remains; provides that persons designated by a member of the military shall have first priority.
LawCode: Amd ยง4201, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the priority of persons with responsibility to determine the disposition of human remains
